title: 慕い求めます (我要愛慕你)
author: Takafumi Nagasawa
book: Jesus I'm In Love With You
lyrics_raw:
<1>
耶穌，我要愛慕你
我要愛慕你，傾倒我的生命
你是我唯一所求
讓我心單單渴慕你
[region 2]
Jesus, I'm in love with You
I'm in love with You
Forever I'll be Yours
You are everything to me
And all I ever need is You
</1>
<chours>
我心滿溢，我心滿溢
對你的愛和思念無止盡
讓我走向 你的身旁 貼近你
主啊，我渴慕尋求你
[region 2]
My heart is full my heart is full
With love and desire
That will know no end
Come draw me near
In Your embrace I belong
Lord all I ever need is You
</chours>

content.origin:
耶穌，我要愛慕你
我要愛慕你，傾倒我的生命
你是我唯一所求
讓我心單單渴慕你
content.region:
Jesus, I'm in love with You
I'm in love with You
Forever I'll be Yours
You are everything to me
And all I ever need is You
content.origin_text:
耶穌，我要愛慕你
我要愛慕你，傾倒我的生命
你是我唯一所求
讓我心單單渴慕你
content.region_text:
Jesus, I'm in love with You
I'm in love with You
Forever I'll be Yours
You are everything to me
And all I ever need is You

我要愛慕你，傾倒我的生命

title: How Great Thou Art
copyright: 1953 Stuart K. Hine, Renewed 1981 Manna Music, Inc.
lyrics_raw:
<1>
Oh Lord my [A2]God, when I in [D]awesome wonder
Consider [A2]all the [E]works Thy h[Bm]ands have m[A2]ade;
I see the stars, I hear the [D]rolling thunder:
Thy pow'r through[A2]out the [E]uni[Bm]verse dis[A2]played.
[region 2]
主啊我神！我每逢舉目觀看
祢手所造一切奇妙大工
看見星宿，又聽到隆隆雷聲
祢的大工遍滿了宇宙中
</1>
<chorus>
Then sings my[A2] soul my[D] Savior God to[A2] Thee,
How great Thou [E]art, how great Thou [A2]art;
Then sings my soul my [D]Savior God to [A2]Thee,
How great Thou [E]art[Bm], how g[E]reat Tho[A2]u art.
[region 2]
我靈歌唱，讚美救主我神
祢真偉大，何等偉大！
我靈歌唱，讚美救主我神
祢真偉大，何等偉大！
</chorus>
<2>
When through the [A2]woods, and forest [D]glades I wander,
And hear the [A2]birds sing [E]sweetly [Bm]in the [A2]trees;
When I look down from lofty [D]mountain grandeur,
And hear the b[A2]rook and [E]feel the [Bm]gentle [A2]breeze.
[region 2]
真懊了解，上帝無惜祂聖子，
差來世間替人類獻生命；
佇十架頂甘願替贖咱罪過
流血慘死，互我通得永活
</2>
<3>
And when I [A2]think that God, His [D]Son not sparing
Sent Him to [A2]die, I [E]scarce can [Bm]take it [A2]in;
That on the cross, my burden [D]gladly bearing,
He bled and d[A2]ied to [E]take a[Bm]way my [A2]sin.
[region 2]
當主再來，歡呼聲響徹天空
何等喜樂，主接我回天家
我要跪下，謙躬的崇拜敬奉
並要頌揚，神啊祢真偉大
</3>
<4>
When Christ shall [A2]come with shout of [D]acclamation
And take me [A2]home, what [E]joy shall [Bm]fill my [A2]heart;
Then I shall bow in humble [D]adoration,
And there proc[A2]laim my [E]God how [Bm]great Thou [A2]art!
</4>

content.origin:
Oh Lord my [A2]God, when I in [D]awesome wonder
Consider [A2]all the [E]works Thy h[Bm]ands have m[A2]ade;
I see the stars, I hear the [D]rolling thunder:
Thy pow'r through[A2]out the [E]uni[Bm]verse dis[A2]played.

title: 我願為你去
author: 林婉容
lyrics_raw:
<1>
用聖[D]靈與火[A/C#]為我[Bm]施洗
[Bm/A]讓我[G]充滿[D/F#]天上的[Em]能力[A7]
讓聖[D]火燒盡邪情[F#/C#]和[Bm]私慾[Bm/A]
因為[G]我願[A7]為祢[D]去
[region 2]
May Your Spirit come like a fire,
Grant me power from places higher,
And consume my every stray desire
For I want to go for You.
</1>
<2>
成為[D]我的異象[A/C#]，榮耀[Bm]救主
[Bm/A]讓萬[G]國的榮[D/F#]華盡都[Em]失色[A7]
賜我[D]勇敢的心[F#/C#]一無[Bm]畏懼[Bm/A]
因為[G]我願[A7]為祢去[D]
[region 2]
Show Your glory in a revelation
That outshines the splendor of the nations;
Give me boldness without hesitation,
For I want to go for You.
</2>
<chorus>
釘痕D手F#/C#引我前[Bm]行[Bm/A]
我只[G]願[D/F#]合祢心[Em7]意[A7]
看萬[G]事為損[D/F#]失，受[A/C#]苦為小[Bm]事
[G]靠祢的[Em7]恩典站立[Asus][A7]
[region 2]
May I learn to think Your thoughts
And be led by Your own hands
May I suffer with joy and count all things loss
And by Your grace may I stand!
</chorus>
<bridge>
神聖的[D]愛，[A]融化[Bm]我
神聖的[G]火，[D]熬煉[A]我
神[D/F#]聖的[G]使命，[A]佔有[Bm]我
神聖的[Em7]靈，[E7]引領[A]我
[region 2]
Lord, melt my heart with Your love
Refine my soul with Your fire
With every mission, Lord send me
And Spirit, lead, be my guide!
</bridge>

content.origin:
用聖[D]靈與火[A/C#]為我[Bm]施洗
[Bm/A]讓我[G]充滿[D/F#]天上的[Em]能力[A7]
讓聖[D]火燒盡邪情[F#/C#]和[Bm]私慾[Bm/A]
因為[G]我願[A7]為祢[D]去
content.region:
May Your Spirit come like a fire,
Grant me power from places higher,
And consume my every stray desire
For I want to go for You.

因為[G]我願[A7]為祢去[D]
content.region:
Show Your glory in a revelation
That outshines the splendor of the nations;
Give me boldness without hesitation,
For I want to go for You.
content.origin_text:
成為我的異象，榮耀救主
讓萬國的榮華盡都失色
賜我勇敢的心一無畏懼
因為我願為祢去
content.region_text:
Show Your glory in a revelation
That outshines the splendor of the nations;
Give me boldness without hesitation,
For I want to go for You.
content.origin_chord:
成為我的異象    ，榮耀救主
讓萬國的榮華盡都失色    
賜我勇敢的心一無畏懼    
因為我願為祢去

content.name: c
content.origin:
釘痕D手F#/C#引我前[Bm]行[Bm/A]
我只[G]願[D/F#]合祢心[Em7]意[A7]
看萬[G]事為損[D/F#]失，受[A/C#]苦為小[Bm]事
[G]靠祢的[Em7]恩典站立[Asus][A7]
content.region:
May I learn to think Your thoughts
And be led by Your own hands
May I suffer with joy and count all things loss
And by Your grace may I stand!
content.origin_text:
釘痕D手F#/C#引我前行
我只願合祢心意
看萬事為損失，受苦為小事
靠祢的恩典站立

content.name: b
content.origin:
神聖的[D]愛，[A]融化[Bm]我
神聖的[G]火，[D]熬煉[A]我
神[D/F#]聖的[G]使命，[A]佔有[Bm]我
神聖的[Em7]靈，[E7]引領[A]我
content.region:
Lord, melt my heart with Your love
Refine my soul with Your fire
With every mission, Lord send me
And Spirit, lead, be my guide!
content.origin_text:
神聖的愛，融化我
神聖的火，熬煉我
神聖的使命，佔有我
神聖的靈，引領我
